title: Tech Talk. Episodes 9 & 10
creator_credit: John Kyle, SBS-TV and Allenog Pty Ltd
brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. There is also a segment on survival skills The topics covered are as follows:- Zookeeper and Animal technician, Australian History Industry, Permannent part-time work in the Banking industry, Fire-fighting either with the Metropolitan Fire Brigade or Country Fire Brigade, Visual display artist, Bar attendant, Surviving in a city and Buying your fist car. The program is presented by Michael Schildberger
